mapper.select: SELECT *, DATEDIFF( CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(date, '%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%m-%d') THEN CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-', DATE_FORMAT(date, '%m-%d')) ELSE CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()) + 1, '-', DATE_FORMAT(date, '%m-%d')) END, CURDATE() ) as days_remaining FROM anniversaries WHERE id = #{id}
